thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1722
thread.title: Stanley

author: Stanley
title: Stanley
text: I recently booked an international flight (easy to do) but failed to opt out of the life/medical insurance. I immediately called flight hub and after a few minutes wait one of flight hubs service people took my information, cancelled the insurance and assured me the money would be added back to my account in the next 2-10 days. Phone lines are busy but service was good.
